SIGNATURE SERIES Your heart is the most important muscle in your body. Are you doing enough to keep it strong? This breakthrough formula contains critical nutrients that have been researched for their potential to help maintain your body’s cardiovascular health and blood flow. We recommend this clinical-grade formula for daily useby anyone concerned with overall heart health. UPGRADED FORMULA INCLUDES TAURINE, BEET ROOT & GRAPE SEED EXTRACT! Members save 15% Members save 15% Chief Medical Board-Approved & Backed by the Latest Science Research-Backed for Effectiveness Unique Formulas for Optimal Wellness Third-Party-Tested for Quality and Purity **OUR HEALTHY HEART FORMULA CONTAINS:** Thiamin, B6, Folate & BiotinThiamin aids in the proper contraction of heart muscles while B6 may help lower blood pressure.Folate aids in reducing homocysteine levels, promoting cardiovascular health while Biotin may help support healthy nervous system function. Selenium & Beet Root PowderSelenium may contribute to cardiovascular health by reducing inflammation and preventing oxidative damage while Beet root is rich in nitrates, which are converted into nitric oxide that may improve blood flow and reduce blood pressure. TaurineMay support heart muscle function by regulating the contraction and relaxation of the muscle, supporting healthy cardiac function. Grape Seed ExtractMay support the heart due to its anticoagulant properties. It also promotes nitric oxide production, which relaxes and widens blood vessels for optimal cardiovascular support. Healthy Heart Formulasaves you 64% per bottle. WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING Healthy Heart Formulasaves you 64% per bottle. WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING **MORE ABOUT HEALTHY HEART FORMULA** **BEET ROOT, GRAPE SEED + TAURINE** Beet Root and Grape Seedare potent natural ingredients thatpromote hearthealth through different mechanisms. Beetroot is rich in dietary nitrates, whichencourages healthy blood flow and reduces inflammation in the blood vessels. Grape seed, meanwhile, is abundant in proanthocyanidins: powerful antioxidants that protect blood vessels from oxidative stress and supporthealthycholesterol levels. Together, they can reduce inflammation,promote blood flow, and support healthy blood pressure. Adding these botanicals into your daily regimen may improve exercise performance and support overall heart health. Taurineis an amino acid that plays a leading role in supporting heart health. It helps regulate calcium levels in your heart cells, which is essential for maintaining a steady and strong heartbeat. It also acts as an antioxidant, helping protect your heart from oxidative stress and damage. Additionally, Taurine supports healthy blood pressure by promoting healthy blood vessel functionand circulation. Taurine’s abilityto strengthen and protect a healthy heart makes it valuable for overall cardiovascular performance. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Allergen Warning: This product is produced in an a facility that may also process ingredients containing milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, and soybeans. Intended for use by adults 18 years of age and over. Do not use if the seal under the cap is broken or missing. Please contact a healthcare practitioner or email support@twc.health before taking or using this supplement. Keep out of the reach of children.
